content: as you work this project you ll soon appreciate why we call it your go-to crochet shawl fast and fun this layer is stitched from the center-back out making it easily customized to any finished size using basic crochet stitches along with some that may be new to you this shawl is made in an easy to memorize 2-row repeat with a picot edging this pattern features lots of cozy texture and is ultra cozy in easy to care for caron one pound the best part one ball makes a shawl this pattern features lots of texture from caron one pound plus a 2-row repeat that s easy to memorize and a cinch to whip up
